text: Now along comes his solo disc, featuring two of his own compositions, "Deerstalker" and "Almost Grown Up." VERDICT: Mr. Lisbon has it taped. And tacked. And he says: "Just as well I had only one box of tacks - it might have been so different.... More news from the ivory-thumping dept.... Russ Conway, who has tinkled his way on an old piano, comes in with another of his own works: "Parade of the Poppets" (Columbia).
